title: New breath of life. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: Bob Berk, Frank Gardonyi, David Adams and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Revised version of Film no 505488. Shows first aid techniques to use when people are choking. Notes the methods of opening the airway, dislodging foreign objects, and mouth-to-mouth breathing.
creator_credit_for_label: Bob Berk, Frank Gardonyi, David Adams and Pyramid Films
